data.eml:eml: Review of the tent-web spider genus Uroctea Dufour, 1820 in China, with descriptions of two new species (Araneae: Oecobiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yang, Zi-Zhong, Yang, Zhi-Bin, Zhao, Yu, Zhang, Zhi-Sheng (2019): Review of the tent-web spider genus Uroctea Dufour, 1820 in China, with descriptions of two new species (Araneae: Oecobiidae). Zootaxa 4679 (1): 126-138, DOI: 10.11646/zootaxa.4679.1.8
